text: Aspergillus pseudodeflectus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Usti section. The species was first described in 1975.Samson, R.A.; Mouchacca, J. 1975. Additional notes on species of Aspergillus, Eurotium and Emericella from Egyptian desert soil. Antonie van Leeuwenhoek. 41(3):343-351 It has been reported to produce drimans, ophiobolins G and H, and austins. ==Growth and morphology== A. pseudodeflectus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_pseudodeflectus_cya.png|Aspergillus pseudodeflectus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_pseudodeflectus_meaox.png|Aspergillus pseudodeflectus growing on MEAOX plate == References == pseudodeflectus Category:Fungi described in 1975
title: Aspergillus pseudodeflectus
